title: Ronald McDonald statue hamburgled from Mass. home; family offers reward for return
text:
Published By: Cleveland.com: US News - Yesterday 
The 3-foot-high statue of the fast food pitchman was taken in August, when a teen daughter hosted an unauthorized party at the house in Leve...
